member.name: WithArgb
member.summary: Changes any of the rgb values from a .
member.returns: A new with any of the supplied rgb values overridden.

member.name: WithAhsb
member.summary: Changes any of the hsb values from a .
member.param: The new hue within the range of 0 - 360.
The new saturation within the range of 0.0 - 1.0.
The new brightness within the range of 0.0 - 1.0.
